Author: FabioCarpi
Title: [ANN] BPAY.IO - PAYMENT PROCESSING FOR CRYPTO ERA
Body: Hello!Thank you for your interest in our project. Bpay is not just platform that allows cryptocurrency transactions. We have a lot of advantages. Our commission will be 0.2 % and we will have the financial license for worldwide payments. Also we created the system that will be available not only for online but also for the offline trading. For more detail information read our White Paper: https://www.bpay.io/en-whitepaper.pdf

Title: [ANN] BPAY.IO - PAYMENT PROCESSING FOR CRYPTO ERA
Body: Well the idea of this project is not so bad currently token markets is like expanding after big bang of crypto-universe but I have few questions about this project :  1. How do you generate token value?  2. is there any benefits for token holders?  3. How much % of the token is being reserved for team and if any locking period, then how long it is for the team?

Author: meaamir86
Title: [ANN] BPAY.IO - PAYMENT PROCESSING FOR CRYPTO ERA
Body: Bitcointalk thread Comments: You Stated in your white paper that "Bpay.io is an instrument which allows accepting, withdrawing and keeping track of funds in various trading transactions (ofline, online)" So please let me know how you will store funds and what is the security mechanism. How will you protect the funds and privacy of the investors?

Author: FabioCarpi
Title: [ANN] BPAY.IO - PAYMENT PROCESSING FOR CRYPTO ERA
Body: Token Supply for Private token sale/Public token sale: 600.000.000 ( 60%) 10% will be distributed for the Private Token Sale 50% will be distributed for the Public Token Sale 5% will be distributed for marketing and Bounty Program 10% are reserved for the strategic partners 25% are reserved for the Team and Token distribution to the key clients for fast scalability of the product on the market  Benefits for Seller: Acceptance of a maximum pool of cryptocurrencies Protection against market volatility Protection against fraud Funds withdrawal to personal cryptocurrency account Funds withdrawal to your personal bank account within 24 hours 24/7 Support  Benefits for Buyer: 0,2% commission on purchase Payments in your currency are accepted on thousands of websites Payments in your currency are accepted on thousands of offline sales outlets 24/7 Support Money-back guarantee through the "Buyer Protection" system

Author: FabioCarpi
Title: [ANN] BPAY.IO - PAYMENT PROCESSING FOR CRYPTO ERA
Body: Bpay is not just platform that allows cryptocurrency transactions. We created the system that will be available not only for online but also for the offline trading. Bpay is going to push its own bourse, where will be accredited all altcoins for the turnover in Bpay payment system. The tokens would also give possibility to enter the bourse and so, it would be charged as a commission for all bourse transactions. Such a scheme would ensure a stable and constant growth of token’s value and demand for it. We make a contract with Bitfury Crystal for the blockchain transactions and frauds analysis. http://crystalblockchain.com

Author: gingerale21
Title: [ANN] BPAY.IO - PAYMENT PROCESSING FOR CRYPTO ERA
Body: Hello. Why people should trust to smart contract?

Author: FabioCarpi
Title: [ANN] BPAY.IO - PAYMENT PROCESSING FOR CRYPTO ERA
Body: With smart contracts we only need to secure the beginning of the chain to the real world. All ownership transactions after that, can be done entirely electronic. Or rather the work usually done by the trusted third party can be done electronically. And all participants can feel confident that there is a “paper-trail,” over all changes and events which has happened which can’t be retroactively modified.

Title: [ANN] BPAY.IO - PAYMENT PROCESSING FOR CRYPTO ERA
Body: Bpay is not just platform that allows cryptocurrency transactions. We have a lot of advantages. Our commission will be 0.2 % and we will have the financial license for worldwide payments. Also we created the system that will be available not only for online but also for the offline trading. Less comission - more demand. Also at the end of this spring, Bpay is going to push its own bourse, where will be accredited all altcoins for the turnover in Bpay payment system. The tokens would also give possibility to enter the bourse and so, it would be charged as a commission for all bourse transactions. Such a scheme would ensure a stable and constant growth of token’s value and demand for it.

Author: cryptoloveralpha1
Title: [ANN] BPAY.IO - PAYMENT PROCESSING FOR CRYPTO ERA
Body: Hi. Why did you choose blockchain for your activity? Could you work without block chain?

Author: FabioCarpi
Title: [ANN] BPAY.IO - PAYMENT PROCESSING FOR CRYPTO ERA
Body: Thanks for a good question! First of all we are dealing with cryptocurrency market so it makes sense to create a blockchain-powered platform Also blockchain provides high level of security, since we work with transaction, this point is very important. We do not need mediation. In non-blockchain platforms you will always have mediation between seller and buyer. Check our White Paper and Road Map

Author: Lovecove
Title: [ANN] BPAY.IO - PAYMENT PROCESSING FOR CRYPTO ERA
Body: I took a glance at the whitepaper, and it seems like bpay is trying to be an aggregate payment service platform.  It's taking not just crypto, but stocks, offline transactions, and other financial events and throwing them all into its system for better organization and aggregation.  Then it allows for the account holder to convert any received funds into crypto, fiat, or whatever and also to transfer into a bank account (or I guess, wallet address).  What's interesting is they also allow for a medium between crypto and credit card. Somehow if someone is paying in crypto, Bpay converts it into fiat to the seller's choice of fiat or credit/debit card processing via Bpay's visa backend.  The team looks kinda okay. The founder has been CEO of mobile companies for almost a decade. But he only got into crypto this year... That's okay since he has business experience. Business experience is usually lacking in crypto core teams. The CTO has 2 decades of experience in development... so that's cool too.  What worries me is their crypto experience. Other than that, the team seems good. I haven't looked into the companies they were associated with to see if the companies were super successful or if they went belly up.  I would invest in this ICO if I could care enough, but right now there are better things out there.
